short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to inspect and copy element styles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
StyleSnipe makes it easy to inspect and understand the styles of any webpage element. It provides a quick and clear view of an element's layout and style details.

Features:
• Hover to see grid lines showing element position.
• View margin, padding, font size, weight, line height, family, and Actual Rendered font.
• Press spacebar to lock the hover card for detailed inspection.
• See both HTML and CSS styles of the element.
• Copy styles easily for your own use.

StyleSnipe is lightweight and focused on what matters: giving you instant visual feedback about any element's styles and position. No complex configuration needed – just hover and inspect.
